info.title: getMasterchainInfo example
info.description: This is an API example for getMasterchainInfo, a method to retrieve information about the current state of the TON masterchain.

200.description: Information about the current state of the TON masterchain

seqno.description: The sequence number of the last masterchain block

shard.description: The shard identifier of the last masterchain block

workchain.description: The workchain identifier of the last masterchain block

fileHash.description: The file hash of the last masterchain block

rootHash.description: The root hash of the last masterchain block

fileHash.description: The file hash of the initial masterchain block

rootHash.description: The root hash of the initial masterchain block

stateRootHash.description: The state root hash of the masterchain
